metadata.title: American Pride unisex-adult Two Pack Merino Wool Hiking Socks
features: Itch-free Merino wool performance hike socks
description: Two pair itch-free Merino wool hiking socks. Take to the trail, whether it's in the woods or on the street, in high performance Merino wool hiking socks. Featuring Merino wool yarn, just the right amount of spandex to keep them right where they're supposed to be, and nylon reinforcement yarns for superior durability in high wear areas, These performance hiking socks won't let you down. Superior wicking capabilities and Merino wool's natural properties will bring you mile after mile of happiness!
metadata.details: {"Item model number": "7914", "Department": "Unisex-adult", "Date First Available": "January 2, 2019", "Manufacturer": "Nester Hosiery, LLC"}
